mapper.insert: insert into user_defined_functions (UDF_NAME, UDF_RETURN_TYPE, UDF_TYPE, UDF_LIBRARY, UDF_USAGE_COUNT) values (#{udfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udfReturnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udfLibrary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udfUsageCount,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select UDF_NAME, UDF_RETURN_TYPE, UDF_TYPE, UDF_LIBRARY, UDF_USAGE_COUNT from user_defined_functions
